english.segment1: walking down the street got my guitar strapped to my back. i'm headed to south beach cuz that's the place where i sleep at. surfing all day long yea and at night we're gonna sing some songs. as it goes (as it goes) on and on (on and on) something like this
english.segment2: jump in and let go. jump in and follow. i know you want to come along. jump on in jump on in jump on in. what what what!. jump on in jump on in jump on in. until the sun goes down
english.segment3: there's a big beach in maui and oahu's got sandies. the north shores' where the surfers go and all the tourists. to check out the show. malibu in cali, santa monica, orange county. south beach, martha's vineyard is my backyard is my backyard
english.segment4: jump in and let go (jump in everybody jump). jump in and follow. i know you want to come along (everybody). jump on in (jump on in) jump on in (jump on in) jump on in. what what what!. jump on in (jump on in) jump on in (jump on in). until the sun goes down
english.segment5: open up my eyes in time to see the sun rise again. it's time for me to rise again. looking out to heaven. walking barefoot in the sand. i'm gonna step into the ocean sayin. who are you? who are you? who are you? who are you?
english.segment6: jump in and let go (jump in everybody jump). jump in and follow. i know you want to come along (everybody). jump on in (jump on in) jump on in (jump on in) jump on in. what what what!. jump on in (jump on in) jump on in (jump on in) jump on in. what what what!. jump in and let go (jump in everybody jump). jump in and follow. i know you want to come along (so come along). jump on in (jump on in) jump on in (jump on in) jump on in. what what what!. jump on in (jump on in) jump on in. until the sun goes down
